attributes.action: Grant imediate residency to our loyal Gurkhas. Both present and past!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The governments decision to "restrict" residency for what are and have always been, amongst our best and most loyal soldiers, is despicable and SHAMEFUL! Wake up and be as loyal to them as they are and have been for almost 2 centuries! This decision is nothing but blatant RASISM!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
